reviews.review: Its a good and really balanced game in terms of scariness. However I did not like how the movement was I couldnt do much I know its based on the mouse too but my keys somehow felt weird. Other than movement the game was an amazing experience.

I've played just about every farming sim on the market, and let me tell you, after you get repeatedly unhooked in front of the killer by a Dwight who doesn't have Borrowed Time and he proceeds to point at and teabag your dead body, no other farming simulator will compare!

To anyone new AVOID this game. As a day 1 player it was fun till after year 3 then after that it got worse and worse to the point where every survivor perk is useless except for 2 and every killer perk is buffed. Killer mains running the forms to be the most brain dead toxic people in the world. SWF can be toxic but 99% of the toxicity is just baby killers wanting a perfect 4.0 kill rate instead of the current 3.7. DO NOT DOWNLOAD and if old player DO NOT RETURN(put 4k hours on xbox as well)

After over 2000 hours in this game and consistently playing for 2 years. I can finally say FUCK this game, ever since i started playing this game it has just gone downhill. Patch after patch after patch it has gotten worse. BHVR nerfs all survivor perks and barely touches killers. (im a killer main btw) They do not know how to make a balanced game. Screw this game and what BHVR has done with it.
Take the game with a grain of salt you'll need it.
big rabbit lady make me happy

I regret every action ive made to play dbd. for the love of god NEVER play this game. Or do I cant control you because it is pretty nice the first 10 hours and then... it all goes downhill. Either you get camped or you get toxic, pick your poison with this game <3

There are a lot of really nicely done technical elements in this games' design. This game has a lot of options for customizing your approach to any role, so there's a lot of replay value to be found. I recommend it, the community is pretty solid as well.

this game is fun and better with friends because its funnier and easier because you have communcation.Alone its good but most of your teammates you get are probably bad.But after a few tens or even hundreds of hours you gets kinds boring but if you play it again you'll start playing again.If you watch dbd youtuber you should try there meme perk builds because you'll have a lot of fun.

Been here since day one and I honestly love every bit of it. It has become so much better and balanced than originally. Its not perfect for sure and the community can be toxic but overall it is a really fun game that can easily become addicting.
Good game, wish i got it for 7 dollars instead of 22 but killer is fun uhhhhhhhh don't play it as much anymore but very good thumbs up. Do recommend fun to play with friends on customs

If you wish to play a very repetitive multiplayer game, and love horror movies, this is the game to play.

Kinda unique in its own way, but you'll need the wiki next to you all the time if u don't want to be lost between different killers all unique. I forgo all that by watching videos when the game launched because the premise was interesting, but with diferent surivors all the same but each one with specific skills you'll need to grind alongside the ones from all the killers from the game, this is not an easy path. Honesty i feel its a fuckfest of builds (which is the worst i feel for the survivors) but each one has personality, usefulness and its kinda straight forward once you know what you are doing. If you are willing to forgo the obtuse of a 4vs1 multiplayer 6 years old game which has been adding content and making changes constantly troughout its history this is the game for you. Also its funny that the ones that are scared the most of this game are the new players or the very tryhard ones, there is no in between so be my guest which one would you fall into...
 
P.D. Something VERY important to note is that this game is like opening voice chat in OG Call of Duty, you'll never know what kind of piece of shit will be at the other side trying to have fun at your expenses, but you can always do the same to them. What i'm saying is that despite not having voice chat this game exudes toxicity, but its so raw, dumb and human in nature that you come back after a while because "it's not THAT bad" (Again, like CoD)
I get tilted when i play killer, i also get tilted when i play survivor 10/10 would play again

I think the game is mostly hit or miss, it really depends on the people you're playing with to make it a good game. Definitely a game to get if you have a group of friends to play with as the custom game setting allows you to use every perk/item/add-on/offering even if you don't have them unlocked.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
